item.description: Daniel Mata Flores studied geophysical engineering in Venezuela and Brazil and gained professional experience through several projects in Central and South America. Since fall 2019, Daniel is a Ph.D. student in our DAS group, and currently focuses on the interpretation of DAS for monitoring seafloor currents. Daniel is co-supervised by Jean-Paul Ampuero (HDR), Diane Rivet, Diego Mercerat and I.
